article.headline: South Carolina St 60, Miami 50
article.story: CORAL GABLES, Fla. (AP) -- Thurman Zimmerman scored 17 points to lead South Carolina State to a 60-50 upset win over Miami on Tuesday night, the first loss for first-year Hurricanes coach Frank Haith. Robert Hite pulled the Hurricanes (1-1), who trailed most of the game, to within 54-50 when he drained an off-balance 3-pointer with 2:29 left to play. Zimmerman responded by bulling his way in for a basket and a 56-50 Bulldogs lead with 1:01 remaining. South Carolina State (4-1) hit four free throws down the stretch to seal the win. William Frisby had 18 points and Hite 17 for the Hurricanes, who were outrebounded 34-32 by the Bulldogs. Miami shot just 34.7 percent and had more turnovers (16) than assists (14) for the second time this season. The Bulldogs led from the outset, and the Hurricanes tied the game just once, at 8-8. South Carolina State finished the first half on a 14-7 run to take a 31-21 lead into halftime. In the second half, South Carolina State took a 12-point lead on a Zimmerman basket with 14:17 left, but the Hurricanes mounted a 14-2 run to pull within 48-45 capped by Frisby's three-pointer with 8:20 remaining. Frisby scored 9 points during the run. The Bulldogs responded with a 6-0 run, taking a 54-45 lead on a Brian Mason jumper with 3:43 remaining. Miami turned the ball over three times and missed four shots during that stretch.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
